subject: Public Speaking
title: Conflict Escalation
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Conflict Escalation.

hook.text: Start with a small problem. Make it bigger. Then bigger.

buildup.text: Escalation maintains engagement through rising stakes.

discovery.text: Each new complication should feel surprising but logical.

twist.text: Audiences stay hooked when problems get worse before resolution.

climax.text: Escalation mirrors real life. Problems compound.
